snippet.title: Anomaly Collapse - Official Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Dive into the supernatural sci-fi universe of Anomaly Collapse, and take a peek at the threats that await you in this trailer for the upcoming strategy game. In Anomaly Collapse, command a unique trio of furry warriors and sharpen your tactical prowess as you face off against monstrous anomalies in turn-based battles. Harness the synergy of specific class skills, precise positioning, and a vast inventory of items to defeat enemies and unravel the intricate mysteries of this universe.

Anomaly Collapse will be available on PC.
